EmailTemplate.name: NUR-2021FY-LEAD-GEN-FOLLOW-UP-PROGRAM.Kris - 2B
EmailTemplate.subject: Teladoc Health: Virtual Healthcare Strategy
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=Hello}},
We appreciate your interest in Teladoc Health! Just a follow-up to see if you would like further insight into how our virtual health solution delivers the technology, access, quality and breadth of care that set us apart. Including a few facts below, material outlining Teladoc Health Virtual Care Services Overview (https://view.highspot.com/viewer/606b3b2e6a3b11640b8b4e81), and direct scheduling options if you have 15 minutes for a brief introductory call: https://calendly.com/krisfloyd/15-minute-teladoc-chat
Teladoc Health virtual care solution gives members: • 24/7 access to board-certified doctors on-demand by phone or video • General medical, primary, acute, complex, chronic and mental healthcare • Diagnoses, treatment and prescribed medication if necessary • A new, more cost-effective front door to the healthcare system to feel better faster • 4x greater utilization over industry average
Looking forward to your reply.
Warmly, Kris
Kris Floyd Lead Development Representative Teladoc Health, Inc.
O (855) 549-2214 | C (830) 734–3138 kris.floyd@teladochealth.com
